title: Trailblazer League/Tasks/Fremennik Provinces

properties.name: description
properties.value: Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

Easy[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

With 10 tasks available, there are a total of 100 league points that can be earned from easy tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Switch to the Lunar Spellbook Switch to the Lunar Spellbook. N/A N/A
Defeat a Rock Crab in the Fremennik Province Defeat a rock crab in the Fremennik Province. N/A N/A
Defeat a Cockatrice in the Fremennik Province Defeat a cockatrice in the Fremennik Province. 25 Slayer N/A
Defeat a Pyrefiend in the Fremennik Province Defeat a pyrefiend in the Fremennik Province. 30 Slayer N/A
Defeat a Troll in the Fremennik Province Defeat a troll in the Fremennik Province. N/A N/A
Complete the Easy Fremennik Diary Complete all of the easy tasks in the Fremennik Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Deposit an Item Using Peer the Seer Deposit an item into your bank using Peer the Seer. N/A N/A
Use the Bank on Jatizso Use the bank on Jatizso. N/A N/A
Use the Bank on Neitiznot Use the bank on Neitiznot. N/A N/A
Use the Bank on Lunar Isle Use the bank on Lunar Isle. N/A N/A

Medium[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 50 league points upon completion.

With 18 tasks available, there are a total of 900 league points that can be earned from medium tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Cast Moonclan Teleport Cast the Moonclan Teleport spell. 69 Magic N/A
Move Your House to Rellekka Move your Player Owned House to Rellekka. 30 Construction N/A
Craft 50 Astral Runes Craft 50 astral runes at the Astral Altar. 40 Runecraft N/A
Complete the Penguin Agility Course Complete a lap of the Penguin Agility Course. 30 Agility Requires completion of Cold War
Catch a Snowy Knight Catch a snowy knight. 35 Hunter N/A
Unlock Free Use of the Blast Furnace Unlock free use of the Keldagrim Blast Furnace by speaking with the Foreman. 60 Smithing N/A
Use Some Icy Basalt to Teleport to Weiss Use some icy basalt to teleport to Weiss. N/A Requires Making Friends with My Arm completed.
Defeat a Basilisk Knight Defeat a basilisk knight in the Jormungand's Prison. 60 Slayer N/A
Defeat a Kurask in the Fremennik Province Defeat a kurask in the Fremennik Province. 70 Slayer N/A
Equip a Brine Sabre Equip a brine sabre. 40 Attack Requires 47 Slayer to kill brine rats and Olaf's Quest
Defeat a Dagannoth in the Fremennik Province Defeat a Dagannoth in the Fremennik Province. N/A N/A
Equip a Helm of Neitiznot Equip a helm of neitiznot. N/A N/A
Defeat a Turoth in the Fremennik Province Defeat a turoth in the Fremennik Province. 55 Slayer N/A
Defeat a Jelly in the Fremennik Province Defeat a jelly in the Fremennik Province. 52 Slayer N/A
Complete the Medium Fremennik Diary Complete all of the medium tasks in the Fremennik Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Complete Throne of Miscellania Complete the Throne of Miscellania quest. See quest page N/A
Complete Royal Trouble Complete the Royal Trouble quest. See quest page N/A
Complete Olaf's Quest Complete Olaf's Quest. See quest page N/A

Hard[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 100 league points upon completion.

With 23 tasks available, there are a total of 2,300 league points that can be earned from hard tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Cast Fertile Soil Cast the Fertile Soil spell. 83 Magic N/A
Build a Gilded Altar Build a gilded altar in a Chapel in your player-owned house. 75 Construction N/A
Complete the Rellekka Agility Course Complete a lap of the Rellekka Rooftop Course. 80 Agility N/A
Harvest a Snapdragon in Weiss Harvest a snapdragon you've grown in Weiss. 62 Farming N/A
Trap a Sabre-Toothed Kyatt Trap a sabre-toothed kyatt. 55 Hunter N/A
Use Your Portal Nexus to Teleport to Weiss Use a portal nexus in your player-owned house to teleport to Weiss. 72 Construction Requires Making Friends with My Arm completed.
Defeat Vorkath Defeat Vorkath on Ungael. N/A N/A
Equip an Ava's Assembler Equip an ava's assembler. 70 Ranged N/A
Defeat Vorkath in 2:00 Defeat Vorkath on Ungael in 2:00 or less. N/A N/A
Defeat the Dagannoth Kings Without Leaving Defeat all three of the Dagannoth Kings in the Waterbirth Island Dungeon without leaving their area. N/A N/A
Equip a Berserker Ring Equip a berserker ring. N/A N/A
Equip a Warrior Ring Equip a warrior ring. N/A N/A
Equip a Seers Ring Equip a seers ring. N/A N/A
Equip an Archers Ring Equip an archers ring. N/A N/A
Use the Special Attack of a Dragon Axe Use the special attack of a dragon axe. 60 Attack N/A
Equip a Mud Battlestaff Equip a mud battlestaff. 30 Magic, 30 Attack N/A
Equip a Seercull Equip a seercull. 50 Ranged N/A
Equip a Leaf-Bladed Battleaxe Equip a leaf-bladed battleaxe in The Fremennik Provinces. 65 Attack, 55 Slayer N/A
Equip a Full Skeletal Armour Set Equip a full set of skeletal armour. 40 Magic, 40 Defence N/A
Equip a Full Spined Armour Set Equip a full set of spined armour. 40 Ranged, 40 Defence N/A
Equip a Full Rockshell Armour Set Equip a full set of rock-shell armour. 40 Defence N/A
Complete the Hard Fremennik Diary Complete all of the hard tasks in the Fremennik Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Collect Miscellania Resources at Full Approval Collect some resources on Miscellania with an approval rating of 100%. N/A Requires Throne of Miscellania completed.

Elite[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 250 league points upon completion.

With 18 tasks available, there are a total of 4,500 league points that can be earned from elite tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Cast Spellbook Swap Cast the Spellbook Swap spell. 96 Magic N/A
Build a Gilded Portal Nexus Build a gilded portal nexus in a Portal Nexus in your player-owned house. 82 Construction N/A
Equip a Dragonfire Ward Equip a dragonfire ward. 75 Ranged, 70 Defence N/A
Create a Catherby Teleport Tablet Create a Catherby Teleport Tablet. 87 Magic N/A
Equip a Dragonbone Necklace Equip a dragonbone necklace. 80 Prayer N/A
Defeat Vorkath in 1:00 Defeat Vorkath on Ungael in 1:00 or less. N/A N/A
Equip Every Dagannoth King Ring Equip an archers ring, a berserker ring, a seers ring and a warrior ring. N/A N/A
Equip a Neitiznot Faceguard Equip a neitiznot faceguard. 70 Defence Requires 60 Slayer to kill the basilisk knights to obtain the basilisk jaw.
Defeat Vorkath 5 Times Without Special Damage Defeat Vorkath on Ungael 5 times without taking any damage from his special attacks and without leaving his area. N/A N/A
Defeat Vorkath 15 Times Without Leaving Defeat Vorkath on Ungael 15 times without leaving his area. N/A N/A
Defeat Vorkath 250 Times Defeat Vorkath on Ungael 250 times. N/A N/A
Defeat Vorkath 500 Times Defeat Vorkath on Ungael 500 times. N/A N/A
Defeat Vorkath 750 Times Defeat Vorkath on Ungael 750 times. N/A N/A
Defeat Each Dagannoth King 300 Times Defeat all three of the Dagannoth Kings in the Waterbirth Island Dungeon 300 times. N/A N/A
Defeat Each Dagannoth King 650 Times Defeat all three of the Dagannoth Kings in the Waterbirth Island Dungeon 650 times. N/A N/A
Defeat Each Dagannoth King 1000 Times Defeat all three of the Dagannoth Kings in the Waterbirth Island Dungeon 1000 times. N/A N/A
Complete the Elite Fremennik Diary Complete all of the elite tasks in the Fremennik Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Equip a Completed God Book Equip a completed god book. N/A N/A

Master[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 500 league points upon completion.

With 4 tasks available, there are a total of 2,000 league points that can be earned from master tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Build a Demonic Throne Build a demonic throne in a Throne Room in your player-owned house. 99 Construction N/A
Equip Every Draconic Shield Equip a dragonfire ward, a dragonfire shield and an ancient wyvern shield. N/A N/A
Defeat Vorkath in 0:45 Defeat Vorkath on Ungael in 0:45 or less. N/A N/A
Equip Every Completed God Book Equip every completed god book. N/A N/A
